Angels’ Companionship
Those who labor for the good of others are working in union with the heavenly angels. They have their constant companionship, their unceasing
98
ministry. Angels of light and power are ever near to protect, to comfort, to heal, to instruct, to inspire. The highest education, the truest culture, the most exalted service possible to human beings in this world, are theirs.—Gospel Workers, page 515.
